name: Cat's Lover
description: The adventure of an unknown man in an unknown field for your fun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (sp3) Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5600 XT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
